pullRequest.title: Add pod priority class
pullRequest.bodyText:
Detailed description:

Add pod priority classes (see podpriorityclass.yaml and ticket for levels and descriptions)
Addresses review feedback from #637
Add a PostgreSQL Detail dashboard
Add a PostgreSQL Overview dashboard
Add a Pod USE (Utilization/Saturation/Errors) dashboard
Bump a few dependent chart versions
Fix documentation for REST deployment as we've switched from git to tgz deploy.

Which issue(s) this PR fixes:
Fixes #649
Special notes for your reviewer:
Checklist

 Documentation added
 Tests updated

commit.message:
Add priority class

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

Address review feedback

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

Add a PostgreSQL Overview dashboard

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

Fix helm template issue

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

nodes.bodyText: later, might be good to put just <version> in place of v0.8.1 so we don't have to update it with every release.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -107,33 +107,35 @@ bash # reload shell
 nvm install stable #pin the current versions node: v12.10.0, npm: 6.10.3
 npm install -g pm2
 sudo mkdir -p /opt/restapi
+sudo chown restapi: /opt/restapi
 cd /opt/restapi
-git clone https://github.com/hashgraph/hedera-mirror-node.git
-cd hedera-mirror-node/hedera-mirror-rest
 cat > application.yml <<EOF
 hedera:
   mirror:
     db:
       apiPassword: mirror_api_pass
       host: dbhost
 EOF
+wget "https://github.com/hashgraph/hedera-mirror-node/releases/download/v0.8.1/hedera-mirror-rest-v0.8.1.tgz"
